template: <html><head>{{>head head}}</head><body>{{>block header}}{{#each header.modules}}{{#dynamic this}}{{/dynamic}}{{/each}}{{>endblock header}}{{>block main}}{{#each main.modules}}{{#dynamic this}}{{/dynamic}}{{/each}}{{>endblock main}}{{>block footer}}{{#each footer.modules}}{{#dynamic this}}{{/dynamic}}{{/each}}{{>endblock footer}}</body></html>
